long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically bypass any Shopee puzzle or image crawl captcha

This extension will detect and solve any of the above mentioned Shopee captchas automatically. This solver is about 98% accurate. If it fails to solve a captcha, it will detect this and try again automatically. Currently this tool can solve any of the following:

- Puzzle slide
- Image crawl (Similar to puzzle, where piece travels in an arc)

INSTRUCTIONS
- Register and get a key on sadcaptcha.com/shopee-captcha-solver
- Go to the Shopee website
- Submit your sadcaptcha key on the extension

It should give a success message and it will do all the work in the background. If you don't get the success message, then you need to enter the key while the browser is open to Temu

ATTENTION PUPPETEER USERS
If you are incorporating this captcha solver extension into your browser automation, you must use the puppeteer extra stealth plugin. Failure to use the stealth plugin will result in the captcha verification failing. You can get the stealth plugin here: https://www.npmjs.com/package/puppeteer-extra-plugin-stealth
